tool_description: Calculates estimated legal fees, costs, and billing structures based on case complexity, time estimates, and billing arrangements.

case_type.description: Type of legal case for fee estimation

case_complexity.description: Case complexity level (simple, moderate, complex, highly_complex)

billing_type.description: Preferred billing arrangement (hourly, flat_fee, contingency, hybrid)

estimated_duration_months.description: Estimated duration of case in months

paralegal_hours_ratio.description: Ratio of paralegal to attorney hours (0-1)

court_filing_fees.description: Estimated court filing and administrative fees

expert_witness_budget.description: Budget for expert witnesses and consultants

error_messages: Invalid case complexity: Use simple, moderate, complex, or highly_complex
Invalid billing type: Use hourly, flat_fee, contingency, or hybrid
Invalid duration: Estimated duration must be greater than 0 months
Invalid hourly rates: Attorney and paralegal hourly rates must be positive numbers
Invalid ratio: Paralegal hours ratio must be between 0 and 1
Invalid expenses: All expense amounts must be non-negative numbers
usage: Provide case type, complexity, billing type, and estimated duration. Optionally adjust hourly rates and expense estimates. The tool calculates comprehensive fee estimates and billing recommendations.
